Therapies

Individual
therapy

Pellentesque ac lectus nec leo euismod ultrices. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit amet risus.

Behaviour
change

Some behaviours can be toxic or detrimental to your health. Through counselling behaviour change can be encouraged and obtained.

Quitting
Smoking

Smoking is highly addictive habit and detrimental to your health. If you are ready to quit, my programme can greatly increase your chances of remaining smoke free.

Eating
Difficulties

Support for people with anorexia or bulimia and other types of eating difficulties.

Pain, Stress, Depression, Anxiety

Pain, stress, depression and anxiety can be serverly crippling. Support and counselling is provided to help you manage better these conditions and put you on the path to recovery.

First fifteen mintues of consultation are free!

Please do feel free to schedule a call, you will not be charged for the first fifteen minutes.

for all of your thoughts
